name: Guacamole With Charred Corn, Black Beans, and Scallions
description: A combination of beans, corn, and scallions add extra texture to the standard avocado mash.
recipeIngredient: 2 ears of corn, kernels removed, cobs discarded
1 (14-ounce) can black beans, drained, rinsed, and dried

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium skillet over high heat until smoking. Add corn kernels and toss to coat. Cook without moving until well charred on one side, about 2 minutes. Toss and repeat until corn is charred all over, about 6 minutes total. Transfer to a medium bowl. Add beans, scallions, and guacamole. Fold to combine and season to taste with salt and lime juice. Serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
